Html: It is still possible to run Goblin XNA without downloading ARTag. The Goblin XNA source code will build without ARTag, and all of the tutorials will work except tutorial 8, which uses ARTag.

Hi Caio,

Please make the following change:

Line 118: scene.InitVideoCapture(0, 1, VideoCapture.Resolution._640x480, false, VideoCapture.FrameRate._30Hz, GoblinEnums.CameraLibraryType.DirectShow);

to

Line 118: scene.InitVideoCapture(0, 0, VideoCapture.Resolution._640x480, false, VideoCapture.FrameRate._30Hz, GoblinEnums.CameraLibraryType.DirectShow);

If you have only 1 camera, then you should set the videoDeviceID to 0. Actually, this value should be 0 by default since most people will use only 1 camera. I will make this change later on and re-post.

Thanks
Ohan
